movie.title: New Kids Nitro
movie.director: Steffen Haars, Flip Van der Kuil
movie.writer: Steffen Haars, Flip Van der Kuil
movie.actors: Huub Smit, Tim Haars, Wesley van Gaalen, Steffen Haars
movie.plot: Gerrie, Richard, Rikkert, Robbie and Barry from Maaskantje are in a big fight with the village of Schijndel. When a zombie kills someone from Brabant, things get out of hand.
